item.description:
DivorceCare is both a weekly support group/seminar for people who are divorced or separated.

Talk with people who understand and find ways to heal from the hurt of divorce.

Eight to Fifteen of us meet on Thursdays from 6:30- 8:30 pm at Crossroads Childcare Center located at 1301 Edgell Road in Framingham 01701.

15 consecutive Thursday evenings completes one cycle of the curriculum. You can jump in at any point; each discussion stands on its own.

The DivorceCare material is based on a Christian perspective, though people of all faiths and no faith participate in this program. DivorceCare is NOT a dating environment.

Call or e-mail this week to reserve your spot:


David Hartman: (508)-881-8171 // Email David at DivorceCare@crosscommchurch.org

See ministries page on our website at http://www.crosscommc...

Sponsored by Crossroads Community Church
item.how_to_find_us: Parking is in the back of the building; look for the DivorceCare sign, enter through rear door (door F), meetings are held up stairs.
item.name: DivorceCare Meetup Topic is "Owners Manual"
